document.full_text: samsung electronics co said on thursday it had filed a complaint with the u.s. international trade commission against taiwan's au optronics corp and some of its customers for importing and selling flat-screen devices that it says infringe a number of its patents.
document.title: samsung files lcd patent suit against au optronics
lines_and_colors: samsung electronics co said on thursday it had filed a complaint with the u.s. international trade commission against taiwan's au optronics corp and some of its customers for importing and selling flat-screen devices that it says infringe a number of its patents.
